ds:field.name: percentCompleteBasedOn
ds:field.description: This attribute stores the value of parameter based on which the percent complete is calculated

ds:field.name: hasDPMAccess
ds:field.description: This field will be returned only if the user has DPM license

ds:field.name: constraintType
ds:field.description: Reflects ASAP or ALAP depending on schedule from.

ds:field.name: projectVisibility
ds:field.description: A non-controlling identification of the desired Project access.

ds:field.name: ownerName
ds:field.description: The current owner of the object.

ds:field.name: PALId
ds:field.description: The Project Access List object (used for some navigation)

ds:field.name: sequenceOrder
ds:field.description: the task sequence id within a project.

ds:field.name: image
ds:field.description: The thumbnail or type icon associated to the project object.

ds:selectable.expression: evaluate[if attribute[Title] != '' then attribute[Title] else name]

ds:ref-subservice.description: based on global fields in foundation-services

ds:field.name: created
ds:field.description: Date of last creation to any object information.
